# kCMPersistentTrackID_Invalid

**Global Variable**

Indicates an invalid track ID.

## Declaration

```swift
var kCMPersistentTrackID_Invalid: CMPersistentTrackID { get }
```

## Errors

- **Sample Buffer Error Codes**: Errors that occur when processing sample buffer objects.
